cards.text: With an _________, you can see and interact with a set of items on the screen.

Most current Operating systems are called Graphical User Interface because you use a mouse (or some other pointing device) to point at graphical objects on the screen. Is the given statement true or false? (True/False)
User interacts with a ________ interface by typing string of characters at a prompt screen such as C:\>.

MS-DOS is a Disk Operating System which enables the user to organize data files, load and execute(run) program files, and control the input and output devices attached to the computer. Is this true or false?
______ is a single user, single tasking operating system developed by Microsoft
The main system part of MS-DOS consists of twelve files without which you won’t be able to run MS-DOS. Is this true or false? (True/False)
____ is a hidden file that handles input/output operations of your devices like monitor, keyboard, printer, etc. in MS-DOS.
_____ is a hidden file that is used by application programs for different purposes like file management, memory management, execution of other programs and access to a real-time clock in MS-DOS.
_____ is the file which interprets user commands in MS-DOS.
